long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:

Suricata 6 reached EOL in Aug '24[1]. Current stable version is Suricata 7 [2], which is available on fedora40 [3].

Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
suricata-6.0.20-1.el8.x86_64


Not sure on what is the process to have the current stable version in EPEL8+.

Thanks,
Davide

[1] https://suricata.io/2024/08/01/suricata-6-is-now-end-of-life-eol/
[2] https://suricata.io/download/
[3] suricata-7.0.6-1.fc40.x86_64

The upgrade from 6 to 7 is not a straight forward dnf -y update. Working things will break.
https://docs.suricata.io/en/suricata-7.0.6/upgrade.html#upgrading-6-0-to-7-0

I'm wondering how best to call attention to this?

FEDORA-EPEL-2024-a534fa2702 (suricata-7.0.7-1.el8) has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 8.
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2024-a534fa2702

FEDORA-EPEL-2024-1f36d78e1b (suricata-7.0.7-1.el9) has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 9.

You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2024-1f36d78e1b

See also https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for more information on how to test updates.

FEDORA-EPEL-2024-a534fa2702 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 8 testing repository.

You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2024-a534fa2702

See also https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for more information on how to test updates.

bugs.title: please make suricata 7.0.7 available in EPEL9 and EPEL10

bugzilla.short_desc: please make suricata 7.0.7 available in EPEL9 and EPEL10

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
please branch and build Suricata 7.0.7 in EPEL9 or EPEL10

Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
suricata-7.0.7-1.fc42
It is built for 9. It's currently in koji. I don't know if all the prerequisites are available for 10.

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by sgrubb.
This update's test gating status has been changed to 'ignored'.
This update has been pushed to testing.

notes: Various security, performance, accuracy, and stability issues have been fixed. Note, this update is a major upgrade. Please look at the following before upgrading:   https://docs.suricata.io/en/suricata-7.0.6/upgrade.html#upgrading-6-0-to-7-0
